name: treatment of used liquid crystal display, manual dismantling | used liquid crystal display | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/29635/documentation

The process represents the treatment 'used liquid crystal display' by manual dismantling in various fractions.

The activity starts with the waste being available at the gate of the treatment facility. Collection and transportation of the waste to the treatment plant is not included.

This  activity ends when the used liquid crystal display has been dismantled manually.
category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/38:Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities; materials recovery/383:Materials recovery/3830:Materials recovery

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Modelling parameters are not specific to this geography.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: This dataset has been copied from an original dataset covering the geography CH. The uncertainty and Production Volume (PV) has been adjusted accordingly.
